title: URFGOT!!!!
body:
Urfgot (Urgot Skin Concept): 
I am 100% guaranteed that someone else has thought and / or posted this idea, but “F’ it: URFGOT!!!

The skin will be Urf himself with a golden spatula in his left hand floating above the ground (maybe with some water ripple effects below him). Whenever Urfgot has a vocal command he says “URF” like in the music.

Q: Urf throws his golden spatula in the target direction, making a “Bado-ing” sound when it hits a unit.
 
W: Urf surrounds himself in water, (mans gotta have some H2O). 

E: Urf throws a rotten crab that makes a “Splat” sound and breaks apart when it hits the area.
 
R: A laughing Urf ghost swims to the location then kicks the unit, having itself replaced with “Alive” Urf and having the enemy where Urf used to be. 

Laugh: Urf soars into the air with each huge chuckle

Taunt: He magically spawns a toga, points the spatula towards the sky and has a lightning bolt strike it with “URF" ringing through the air.
 
Joke: Urf takes out 3 fish and juggles them in a circle. Saying the joke again has him throw them into his mouth and eat the fish.
 
Dance: Urf takes out two mini-guns and spins rapidly shooting around himself yelling “URF” over 3 seconds 

This skin is wURF, so make sure to upvote so that we can get some Riot attention! 



I did a little tweaking to an already famous [URF picture](http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100330032759/leagueoflegends/images/c/ce/Urf_OriginalSkin.jpg) just to show the concept a little better.

replies.body: So I get to replace ugly ass Urgot with the majestic sea cow?  I'm sold.
I always thought urgot was some ugly, mutated, zombie, radiation infected version of {{champion:60}} 's spiders.

No, they need an urf skin for a mage. So far the have Fizz, Nami, Corki, and Warwick with Urf skins. They need a midlaner. I know Urgot get splayed mid, but they need it to be more traditional. I think this could work tho, then corki could go mid, or urgot could go mid, and the other would go ADC. And yes, I did change my opinion halfway through this post.
He does get played mid, but he is a much better top laner, or even jungler.
But not a Mage. Fizz is an assassin and sometimes a bruiser.

>
> Urfgot (Urgot Skin Concept): 
> I am 100% guaranteed that someone else has thought and / or posted this idea, but “F’ it: URFGOT!!!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/ircEgeYe-april-fools-urfgot

I feel ya, still want it a thing.

I WANT THIS.

I WANT THIS SO BAD.

RITO PLEASE.

I SWEAR TO JEGUS PLEASE. 

I LOVE YOU ALREADY, BUT PROVE YOU LOVE ME AND MAKE THIS A THING <3 <3 <3
The creation of this skin is the most important challenge of our time. Greatness will come to the one who finally triumphs in its production. May Urgod smile upon you, O prophet of the holy manatee.
This sounds.... Gorgeous. Take my money, please.
